# Prompt: Log Decision

You are logging a product/technical decision for Voxii Desktop.

## Inputs

- Decision title:
- Decision statement (one sentence):
- Rationale (1-3 bullets):
- Status: Proposed | Accepted | Superseded
- Link(s) to context (session/PR/issue):

## Update

Update only:
- `docs/working/DECISIONS.md`

Rules:
- Add a new row with the next available `D-###` ID.
- Keep Notes short; include a relative link to the session if applicable.
- Do not edit `docs/PRD.md`.
